title: Guinean military officer says President Alpha Conde arrested, as apparent coup unfolds
content:
1. Guinean military officer says President Alpha Conde arrested, as apparent coup unfolds  CNN
  2. Col. Mamady Doumbouya says Guinea president Alpha Conde detained in military takeover  The Washington Post
  3. Guinea coup attempt: Soldiers claim to seize power from Alpha Condé  BBC News
  4. #Guinea's Conde 'held' by armed forces: Videos  Al Jazeera English
  5. Guinea President Alpha Condé Held Hostage as Coup Attempt Unfolds in Capital, Conakry  The Daily Beast
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
